error_explanation: This happens when the script, directly or indirectly, refers to itself in some way.
error_suggestion: Such errors can be tricky to handle and require careful consideration when planning out the project architecture.

error_explanation: This error occures when the lines of code use different indentation styles. As GDScript uses [u]indentation[/u] to group lines together, your style needs to be consistent.
error_suggestion: Make sure to use the same indentation style for all your lines. Official guidelines suggest only using [b]tabs[/b] for code indentation.
